id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-59" value="Header id token : Extraction alg et kid" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" y="220" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="134.57999999999998" y="270" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-65" value="kid" </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-66" value="JWKS : Modulus + exposant (RSA)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" y="300" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="133.57999999999998" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-68" value="alg" y="385" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="133.57999999999998" y="435" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-73" value="Validation access token et extraction des Claims" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-53"> <mxGeometry x="15" y="430" width="240" height="50" as="geometry" x="300" y="199.57421977064877" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-61" value="<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">login, password</span>" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="362" y="80" width="120" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-62" value="JWKS" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.007;entryY=0.427;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.993;exitY=0.43;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-71" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1.007;entryY=0.234;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.007;exitY=0.234;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="530" y="310" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="310" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="PAY2dpx7KqBjy-BMNW17-75" value="<b>Limites actuelles&nbsp;</b><br><br>- Uniquement les algorimthemes RSA pour la génération de la clé publique.<br><div style="text-align: left;">&nbsp; &nbsp;- Access token non chiffré.<br>&nbsp; &nbsp;- Paramètre none, pour éviter le replay<br>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;non utilisé.</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="410" width="225" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> div.div:
Limites actuelles
- Uniquement les algorimthemes RSA pour la génération de la clé publique.
- Access token non chiffré.
- Paramètre none, pour éviter le replay
non utilisé.
